title: Help with this font?
content:
This is driving me crazy, I'm sure I have used this font but I can't remember what it's called. Can anyone please help?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [NewportGirlsGymnasticsClub\_Small.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023203640/http:/typophile.com/files/NewportGirlsGymnasticsClub_Small.jpg) | 861.35 KB |
author: Peppermint Mongoose

comments.content:
You can find it as:  
**Eremitage** by Brendel Informatik (1994)  
**Zapotec** by NovelFonts (1994)  
**Watford DB** or **Watford** by SoftMaker (1995)

but you should be extra careful on obtaining a license to use it in a project, as all of the above companies are well known for their font clones/forgeries.  
I suspect that all above are clones of the original, if somebody knows more about it please enlighten us.

------------------  
I found them using "Find my Font": [http://www.findmyfont.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023203640/http:/www.findmyfont.com/ "http://www.findmyfont.com")
The original was Compugraphic's Zarana. I suspect lots of graphics were done years ago using Opti's ripoff. Neither can be had digitally and legitimately today, though.
